bug.author: CeciliaYSui
bug.description:
Describe the bug TemplateNotFound: components/tabs.html To Reproduce My dataframe is confidential and cannot be provided here. But I ran the titanic.py file [from pandas-profiling/examples/titanic/titanic.py], completely unmodified, and got the same error.
pandas==0.24.2 numpy==1.16.2 pandas-profiling==2.1.1 ...etc. Please see pip_freeze.txt file attached. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/files/3383886/pip_freeze.txt>pip_freeze.txt</denchmark-link>
Please see the screenshot and detailed information of the error I got in the attached PDF. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/files/3383902/BugReport.pdf>BugReport.pdf</denchmark-link>
I used pandas profiling last week, and it was working perfectly. When I pip installed it today to my new computer, somehow this error kept coming up. I am inexperienced in programming and I apologize in advance if it ends up being my mistake when using the package. Thank you!
